name: Sodexo
description: Sodexo has been one of Singapore's leading facilities management and food services companies since 1982. They deliver a wide spectrum of services from catering services, kitchen operations management, food waste management, integrated facilities management from offices to production plants. Sodexo is committed to make a positive environmental & social impact since 1966. In 2009, they designed their corporate responsibility roadmap "Better Tomorrow 2025 Plan" with a focus on hunger, waste and gender.
